title: Katie Price treats her children to takeaway as they make the most of half term
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price has indulged her children's whims this half term.

The mother-of-five splurged the cash on takeaway dinner for her children while they made the most of their time together during the holidays.

Jett, six, and Junior, 14, put on a playful display while they sat together on the garden bench to eat their food.

Bunny, five, was sat on the floor near them as she gobbled her plate of food.

Katie was ever the proud mum as she documented the family moment and shared it with her legion of loyal followers.

The mum and her brood were making the most of the autumnal weather by braving the outdoors.

Harvey, 17, and Princess, 12, didn't appear in the photographs Katie uploaded on social media.

(Image: Instagram)

Katie wrote in the caption: "Jett loves finding things to show us all. our little explorer."

The former glamour model was ecstatic to have all five of her children home for half term.

Jett and Bunny have been enjoying a number of nights with their dad Kieran Hayler this week.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

They snuggled up for a cosy movie night in as well as went to the park to feed the ducks before returning to the arms of their mum.

Junior and Princess have been staying at their dad Peter Andre's spotless home .

Ahead of the holiday, the businesswoman gushed about her excitement for the school break.

She wrote: "Can’t wait to spend half term with all my kiddies what has everyone got planned for half term?"

Fans speculated Junior wouldn't be joining them because he wasn't in the picture Katie had shared.

However, it was soon made apparent this was not the case.
description: Katie was ever the proud mum as she documented the family moment and shared it with her legion of loyal followers
